message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,800? I'm really interested in this product and I'm willing to make a serious offer.
